name: Comfy room 3 min to T stop-easy access to Boston
description: Room in 3 bedroom apartment-3 min to T stop (orange line) and bus hub. This room is available for visits for 28 days or longer. Easy access to Boston (10 min) and Cambridge. Comfortable bed for 1-2 people overlooking garden, fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, disposal, microwave, toaster), and good size bathroom. Logan Airport 10 min drive, easy access to downtown. Cambridge, Harvard, MIT, Hult, Assembly Square shops and restaurants. It is conveniently located but exposed to traffic noise. The house is easy to find. If you take public transportation, take orange line subway to Sullivan Square, go to the right, turn right and the it will be the second house around the corner. You will share dining room, fully equipped brand new kitchen with stove, microwave, and coffee maker, and brand new, clean bathroom with a tub and shower. Linen, towel, and all amenities will be provided. You will be able to lock your bedroom using the same pass code you receive for the front door (each guest has
notes: There is no smoking and no pets allowed so don't worry if you have any pet allergies. I do not have parking space available for this apartment. There is 2 hours parking restriction on the street (across the street and a little to the right as you face the house) Mon-Frid 8am-6pm. Practically you would be fine parking there anytime after 4pm, overnight, and until 10 am the next day, and all day/night on weekends. DO NOT park right in front of the house where Resident Parking is indicated. There is also parking lot (Maffa Way Parking) next to the T stop (Sullivan Station) 3 min walk from the house. They charge $6/day, which is very good for Boston. You can easily find it on-line and probably make a reservation but they usually say that they almost always have spaces available. If you are taking a cab, tell the driver to go to Charlestown (the same address exists in downtown Boston so don't let the driver to take you there).

name: Close to Orange line, University, Downtown
description: Do you wish to stay in a comfy&economic private room near Cambridge? It’s historical and convenient location to stay in the house. You could find small market, restaurants, bars, grocery store, laundry store nearby the house in a few blocks away. It’s quiet and safe neighborhood. House location is close to the T(train/subway) station “Sullivan Suqare” on orange line around 10 mins walking distance. It’s close to Downtown, MIT, Harvard, Tufts University. Extra service: We provide picking up service from Logan airport(Ask about it, depends on time. It charges extra service fee). You will have one private bedroom with lock on the door.  Other space like kitchen, bathroom, living room are shared with other guests and please don't put your personal items there. You can choose one area in refrigerator but please don't touch others’ items. To Sullivan Square T station on orange line:  - 10 mins walking. To Downtown/South Station:  - 10-15 mins by T. To Harvard, MIT:  - 5-10 mins by car.  - or
notes: Boston is the city that has lots of historical buildings and old houses. My house is one of them. It's an old house so there would have some old part/small damaged part, but it is clean and good to use. We hired professional housekeeper to do the cleaning. If you have concern, please contact host first.

name: Bright & Modern w/ Free Laundry, WiFi, & Cleaning!
description: This is a 3 story 6 unit Victorian style building in East Somerville. Noted for its high walkability score, East Somerville is a favorite of college students, researchers, and young professionals. The commute to Harvard, Tufts, and MIT is less than half an hour. NOTE: This unit is professionally managed by Bedly, a furnished housing provider. Bedding, pillows, towels, & toiletries are NOT provided, so please plan accordingly. This room is a part of Bedly, a furnished housing community. This space is professionally managed and the Bedly customer support team is available 7 days a week from 9am to 9pm. You will receive full contact information when your reservation is accepted.
